span.span: Defines values for specifying how the widths of columns are adjusted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件可以调整其列以使其填充控件的可用水平宽度或若要使其显示全部内容或指定的单元格的所有单元格的大小。The control can resize its columns to make them fill the available horizontal width of the control or to make them display the full contents of all cells or of specified cells. 与模式下，列的首选宽度由调整处于该模式下的所有列的都大小，以便控件中的所有可见列完全填充可用显示区域的水平宽度。With mode, the preferred width of a column is determined by resizing all columns in that mode so that all visible columns in the control exactly fill the horizontal width of the available display area. 与其他模式的首选的列宽度是显示在列中，如的当前显示的行中的单元格的子集从所有单元格或单元格的子集的最大单元格值所需的最小宽度。With other modes, the preferred column width is the minimum width required to display the largest cell value from all cells or a subset of cells in that column, such as the subset of cells that are in currently displayed rows. 使用单元格的子集确定的新宽度可用于使用很多行数据时避免对性能产生负面影响。Using a subset of cells to determine the new width is useful to avoid a performance penalty when working with many rows of data. 基于内容的自动调整大小可以防止用户调整列宽使用鼠标。Content-based automatic resizing prevents users from adjusting column widths with the mouse. 用户调整大小时中启用了填充模式中，但是。User resizing is enabled in fill mode, however. 此枚举由控件属性和方法。This enumeration is used by the control property and method. 有关大小调整模式的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的大小调整选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about sizing modes, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 有关列填充模式的详细信息，请参见[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的列填充模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/column-fill-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about column fill mode in particular, see [Column Fill Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/column-fill-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此枚举主/从方案中，两个控件将显示在父/子关系中两个表中的数据。The following code example illustrates the use of this enumeration in a master/details scenario where two controls display data from two tables in a parent/child relationship. 在此示例中，主机控件的列大小调整模式为 None，并以编程方式初始化列宽度以适应加载的值。In this example, the column sizing mode for the master control is None and the column widths are programmatically initialized to fit the loaded values. 详细信息控件设置为自动调整大小模式，以便在值更改 （例如，当用户更改父表中的当前行） 时，列将会自动调整。The details control is set to an automatic sizing mode so that columns will adjust automatically whenever the values change (for example, when the user changes the current row in the parent table). 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供[如何： 创建主/从窗体使用两个 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/create-a-master-detail-form-using-two-datagridviews.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Create a Master/Detail Form Using Two Windows Forms DataGridView Controls](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/create-a-master-detail-form-using-two-datagridviews.md).
